		character = root

			}

	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_content
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}

	desc = {
		desc = LIDAs.1.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 1: EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.1
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 1
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 1
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 1
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.7
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10001
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 2
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 2: EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.2
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 2
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 2
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 2
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.8
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6: EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.6
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 6
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 6
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 36
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 6
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.8
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAs.3 = {
	# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE: Handjob Tease
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.3.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = idle
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_content
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAs.3.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 8
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7: EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.7
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 7
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 7
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 7
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.7
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10007
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 8
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 8: EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.8
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 8
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 8
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 8
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.8
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

					value = 10

			# FM_ASS_RUB

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 9
					}

				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 9

					NOT = {

			trigger = {

			}

				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAs.6.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}

		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# FM_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 13
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 14
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 13: EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.13
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 13
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 13
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 13
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.7
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10013
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 14
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 14: EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.14
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 14
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 14
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 14
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.8
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

			name = this_dom_chance

				add = 0
			}

				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 15
			}

		}

			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10015
			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 16
				}

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 19
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.4
			}

			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}

					scope:sex_transition = 10061
				}

		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {

			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}

				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}

			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 27: EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.FM_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.27
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 27
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 27
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 27
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10027
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 28
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.10
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 29
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.11
			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 31
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.4
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 33
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10033
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 34
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.11
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 35
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 34: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.34
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 34
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 34
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 34
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.11
	}
	option = {
		# 35: EventsSex.FM_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.FM_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.35
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 35
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 35
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 35
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.3
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAs.13 = {
	# FM_STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND: Fingered from Behind
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.13.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}

LIDAs.9 = {
	# FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND: Standing Fucked from Behind
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}

		}

		}

		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = courtyard

	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_3

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 23
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# 
				triggered_desc = {

					}
					desc = sex_transition_23.0
				}

			value = 9
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 64
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10064
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 62
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 63
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 65
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 65: EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.65
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 65
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 65
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 65
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.9
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

			CHANGE = -1

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 69
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.18
	}
	option = {
		# 70: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.70
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 70
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 70
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 70
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10070
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 68
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 69
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 71: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
		name = LIDAoption.71
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 71
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 71
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 71
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10071
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 68
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 69
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 72: EventsSex.FM_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.72
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 72
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 72
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.9
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 79
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 75: EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.FM_HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.75
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 75
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 75
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}

		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 75
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.12
	}
	option = {
		# 76: EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY

			scope:finisher_stamina > 0

				scope:sub_transition_1 = 76

	}
	option = {
		# 77: EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.77
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 77
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 77
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 77
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10077
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 75
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.12
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 76
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.17
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 79
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 78: EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
		name = LIDAoption.78
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 78
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 78
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 78
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10078
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 75
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.12
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 76
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.17
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 79
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.9
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 79: EventsSex.FM_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.79
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 79
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 79
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 79
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.9
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 81: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY
		name = LIDAoption.81
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 81
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 81
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 81
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.17
	}
	option = {
		# 82: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.82
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 82
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 82
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 82
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.18
	}
	option = {
		# 83: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.83
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 83
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 83
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 83
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10083
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 81
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.17
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 82
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 85
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.11
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 84: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_KEEP
		name = LIDAoption.84
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 84
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 84
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 84
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.12
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10084
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 81
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.17
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 82
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 85
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.11
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 85: EventsSex.FM_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.85
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 85
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 85
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 85
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.11
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 87: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.87
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 87
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 87
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 87
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.9
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10087
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 88
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 90
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.11
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 88: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.88
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 88
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 88
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 88
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.18
	}
	option = {
		# 89: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.89
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 89
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 89
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 89
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10089
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 88
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.18
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 90
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.11
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 90: EventsSex.FM_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.FM_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.90
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 90
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 90
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 90
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.11
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAs.19 = {
	# MF_WHIP_TEASE: Whip Tease
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.19.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = personality_content
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = idle
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAs.19.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 91
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 92
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 91: EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.91
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 91
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 91
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 91
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.24
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10091
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 92
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.25
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 92: EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.92
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 92
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 92
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 92
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.25
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}

			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}

		}

	}

		}

		event_background = gallows

		}
		event_background = bedchamber

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = study

	override_background = {

		}

	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room

	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 95
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 96
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 95: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.95
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 95
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 95
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 21
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 95
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.24
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10095
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 96
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.25
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 96: EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.96
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 96
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 96
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 21
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 96
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.25
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

LIDAs.27 = {
	# MF_BLOWJOB_SUB: Sub Blowjob
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.27.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {

		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {

			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina

		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# MF_BLOWJOB_DOM

					value = 114
				}
			}

					value = 114
				}

				NOT = {

	option = {
		# 111: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.111
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 111
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 111
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 27
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 111
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.25
		}

			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				value = 10111

			}

LIDAs.28 = {
	# MF_DEEPTHROAT: Deepthroat
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.28.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = throne_room_kneel_2
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 113
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# He takes advantage of your lack of strong resistance to dominate your mouth further. Trapping your head with his hands, he plunges deeper while you gag.\n
				desc = sex_transition_113.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 118
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# He continues fucking your throat while your vision blurs against a mixture of tears, saliva, and sex juices.\n
				desc = sex_transition_118.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10111
				}
				# 111: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_111.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10114
				}
				# 114: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.MF_HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_114.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10117
				}
				# 117: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_117.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 27
			}
			# defaulted to 113: EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition_113.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 28
			}
			# defaulted to 118: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition_118.0
		}
		desc = LIDAs.28.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAs.28.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAs.28.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 2.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MF_BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 117
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 118
				}
			}

				trigger = {

				}

					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 119
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 118
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 118
				}
			}
			# MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 119
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 119
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 117: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.117
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 117
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 117
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 28
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 117
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.27
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10117
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 118
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.28
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 119
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 118: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.118
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 118
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 118
			}
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 28

			CHANGE = -1
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 118
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.28
	}
	option = {
		# 119: EventsSex.MF_DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.MF_BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.119
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 119
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 119
			}
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 28
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 119
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.15
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAs.31 = {
	# MF_ASS_RUB: Ass Rub
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.31.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}

			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}

		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# MF_ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}

					name = dom_transition_0

					}

	option = {
		# 125: EventsSex.MF_ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_RUB
		name = LIDAoption.125
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 125
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 125
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 31
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 125
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.31
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10125
			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 127
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.29
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 129
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.19
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}

		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAs.29 = {
	# MF_HOTDOG: Get Hotdogged
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.29.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 122

		# 134: EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.134
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 134
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 134
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 29
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 134
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.30
	}
	option = {
		# 135: EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.135
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 135
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 135
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 29
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 135
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.26
	}
	option = {
		# 136: EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.MF_ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.136
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 136
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 136
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 29
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 136
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.18
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10136
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 134
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.30
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 135
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.26
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 137
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.19
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 137: EventsSex.MF_HOTDOG -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.137
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 137
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 137
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 29
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 137
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.19
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 143
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.19
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 143: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.MF_CUM_ON_GROIN

		trigger = {
			OR = {

		}

	}

		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 144
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.25
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10144
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 146
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.26
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 147
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 149
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 145: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.MF_BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.145
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 145
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 145
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 1
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 145
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.27
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10145
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 146
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.26
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 147
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 149
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 146: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.146
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 146
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 146

			name = prev_event
			value = 26

			CHANGE = -1
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 146
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.26
	}
	option = {
		# 147: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE

		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0

				scope:sub_transition_1 = 147
			}

		}

			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 147
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.35
	}
	option = {
		# 148: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.148
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 148
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 148
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 148
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10148
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 146
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.26
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 147
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 149
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 149: EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.149
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 149
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 149
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 26
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 149
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.21
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

		}

	option = {
		# 150: EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.150
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 150
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 150
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 32
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 150
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.32
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10150
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 152
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.26
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 153
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 156
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}

					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 160
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 160
				}
			}
			# MF_CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 163
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 163
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 157: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.157
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 157
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 157
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 33
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 157
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.33
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10157
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 159
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.29
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 160
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.34
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 163
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.21
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}

		# 158: EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MF_REVERSE_COWGIRL

			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 164: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MF_COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.164
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 164
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 164
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 34
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 164
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.33
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10164
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 165
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.34
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 166
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 168
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 165: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY
		name = LIDAoption.165
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 165
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 165
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 34
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 165
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.34
	}
	option = {
		# 166: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.166
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 166
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 166
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 34
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 166
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.35
	}
	option = {
		# 167: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.167
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 167
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 167
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 34
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 167
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10167
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 165
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.34
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 166
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 168
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 168: EventsSex.MF_MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.168
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 168
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 168
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 34
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 168
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.23
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}

					scope:sub_transition_0 = 173
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 170: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.170
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 170
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 170
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 35
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 170
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.26
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10170
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 171
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 173
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 171: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.171
		trigger = {
			scope:finisher_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 171
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 171
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 35
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 171
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.35
	}
	option = {
		# 172: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.172
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 172
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 172
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 35
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = dom_chance_breakdown_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 172
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.20
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10172
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 171
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.35
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 173
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.23
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			custom_tooltip = easy_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = special
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 173: EventsSex.MF_PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.MF_CREAMPIE_BREED
		name = LIDAoption.173
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 173
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 173
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 35
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 173
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.23
	}
	after = {
		custom_tooltip = root_stamina_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = partner_stamina_tooltip
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
